column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////My husband and I went to Bosscat for our Friday night date night. We hop around town and had never tried Bosscat before now. This place is wonderful! The atmosphere
column3: and especially the drinks. Our server
column5: took care of us with such courteous and superb service. She recommended the shrimp & grits (which were SO tasty) and a Bosscat cocktail to start us out. We shared other treats as well such as the Cornbread Madeleines and the delicious Brussel sprouts. We will be back for sure!
